# isFinished

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver has finished execution.

## Declaration

```swift
var isFinished: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver has finished execution, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Determining the Thread’s Execution State

- **isExecuting**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is executing.
- **isCancelled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is cancelled.
